data.text: @SenKevinCramer @POTUS They can't make a deal with a murderous regime, President Trump must keep his promise ! https://t.co/Z7LJ1DAJY5

@SenKevinCramer @POTUS When the world negotiates with a regime after mass killings, it sends one message, brutality works. This is not diplomacy, it’s moral collapse. A clear failure for America and for human rights.  #RezaPahlavi

@SenKevinCramer @POTUS The Islamic regime is murdering Iranians as we speak. Its foundation is extremist ideology, and its mission is to spread it by any means, terror, war, mass killing. Negotiation gives them time, nothing more. Nuclear weapons are next, and then a global disaster. #RezaPahlavi

@SenKevinCramer @POTUS Iran cannot be trusted, and any deal would only legitimize a regime that terrorizes its own people and the region. The focus should be on supporting the Iranian people, not rewarding the regime.
